" INSERT TITLE OF THE BOOK "


Oh Necra, our Goddess Your mercifulness is beyond us We have more nor less We curse all around us



Oh Necra, our Mother
Those that have gone await for you
Bargaining with a coin
While we await to go with you.



So we pray in silence
And we cry in silence,
so you can carry us, your children
that lament in a vow of silence.
